Text: The FTSE 100 ended the day on Friday up 22.79 points at 7,367.46, hitting a five-week high  -  with growth coming from UK-focused companies, as foreign-facing firms suffered.
Cause: growth coming from UK-focused companies, as foreign-facing firms suffered.
